question: Show all the action movies and romantic comedies lasting 2 hours.
sql_query1:
SELECT Movies.Title 
FROM Movies
WHERE (Movies.genre = "Action Movie" OR Movies.genre = "Romantic Comedy") AND Movies.duration = 120
sql_query2:
SELECT Movies.Title 
FROM Movies
WHERE Movies.genre = "Action Movie" OR Movies.genre = "Romantic Comedy" AND Movies.duration = 120
interpretation1: Show all the 2 hour films that are classed as either action or romantic comedy.
interpretation2: Show all the action movies, in addition show only the 2 hour long romantic comedy films.
